段: 我ti7新曆5月3號，早起5點鐘，kap台南廳內beh 去日本觀光e5人，十外人，聚集ti7台南廳事務系。稅務課長講明內地e5風俗kap幾若項要緊e5事；講明白大家相辭，就起身。各區長kap稅務課長kap幾若個官，送阮到安平搭台北丸e5貨船。山本總務課長kap台南廳e5通譯通口做伴相kap去。

Goa2 ti7 sin-lek8 5 goeh8 3 ho7, cha2-khi2 5 tiam2-cheng, kap Tai5-lam5-thiaN lai7 beh khi3 Jit8-pun2 koan-kong e5 lang5, chap8 goa7 lang5, chu7-chip8 ti7 Tai5-lam5-thiaN Su7-bu7-he7 . Soe3-bu7 Kho3-tiuN2 kong2 beng5 Loe7-te7 e5 hong-siok8 kap kui2-na7 hang7 iau3-kin2 e5 su7 ; kong2 beng5-pek8 tai7-ke saN-si5, chiu7 khi2-sin . kok khu-tiuN2 kap Soe3-bu7 kho3-tiuN2 kap kui2-na7 e5 koaN, sang3 goan2 kau3 An-peng5 tah tai5-pak-oan5 e5 hoe3-chun5 . San-pun2 Chong2-bu7 kho3-tiuN2 kap tai5-Lam5-thiaN e5 thong-ek8 Thong-khau2 cho3 phoaN7 saN-kap khi3 .
第4號到基隆；e7晡開船，ti7海面兩暝日，風靜海平。到6號就看見五島山kap中島；ti7 chiah-e5所在是出珍珠、珊瑚、土炭e5 所在。

Te7 4 ho7 kau3 Ke-lang5 ; e7-pou khui-chun5, ti7 hai2-bin7 nng7 me5-jit8, hong cheN7 hai2 peN5 . Kau3 6 ho7 chiu7 khoaN3-kiN3 Ngou2-to2-soaN kap Tiong-to2 ; ti7 chiah-e5 sou2-chai7 si7 chhut chin-chu, soan-ho5, thou5-thoaN3 e5 sou2-chai7 .

日暗到長崎港【Nagasaki】；這個港天然港四面有山；所以hit暝昏船pha-teh，聽候天光，醫生kap警察搭船來勘驗，明白，就上山。Hit日tu2著落雨，就歇ti7客店；e7晡kap蕃薯寮廳屬村上以及徐德福、黃丁恩4人相kap坐人力車ai3去探教會。問到一間e5學堂，是法國天主教設--e5，名叫福星學校；不止大間，四五層樓，內面真整頓，學生二百外個，逐個有鐵眠床、面桶架，分商業科、農業科、文科、畫圖、生理、化學、天文、地理，礦務，逐項有分別科目，不止次序。Hit時in e5校長chhoa7阮看逐科e5學廳；器具也齊備，樓頂樓下看明白，就相辭。Koh到一間學堂是咱長老教青年會e5學堂；hit時已經放下，所以無斟酌看。阮請in一人chhoa7阮到禮拜堂；hit間拜堂也是大間有疊樓；牧師姓中村名竹太。伊不止歡喜用恭敬e5禮請阮，也續相kap吟詩做祈禱會來感謝上帝。Ti7 這長崎有幾若間e5禮拜堂，也有天主教不止大間e5拜堂。

Jit8-am3 kau3 Tiong5-kia7 kang2 [Nagasaki] ; chit e5 kang2 thian-jian5 kang2 si3-bin7 u7 soaN ; sou2-i2 hit me5-hng chun5 pha-teh, theng3-hau7 thiN-kng, I-seng kap keng2-chhat tah-chun5 lai5 kham3-giam7, beng5-pek8, chiu7 chiuN7-soaN. Hit jit8 tu2 tioh8 loh8-hou7, chiu7 hioh ti7 kheh-tiam3; e7-pou7 kap Hoan-chu5-liau5 thiaN-siok8 Chhoan Siong7 i2-kip8 Chhi5 Tek-hok, Ng5 Teng-in 4 lang5 saN-kap che7 jin5-lek8-chhia ai3 khi3 tham3 kau3-hoe7. Mng7 kau3 chit8 keng e5 oh8-tng5, si7 Hoat-kok Thian-chu2-kau3 siat--e5, mia5 kio3 Hok-seng Hak8-hau7; put-chi2 toa7 keng, si3 gou7 chan3 lau5, lai7-bin7 chin cheng2-tun3, hak8-seng nng7-pah goa7 e5, tak8-e5 u7 thih bin5-chhng5, bin7-thang2-ke3, hun Siong-giap8-kho, Long5-giap8-kho, Bun5-kho, Oe7-tou5, Seng-li2, Hoa3-hak8, Thian-bun5, Te7-li2, khong3-bu7, tak8 hang7 u7 hun-piat kho-bok8, put-chi2 chhu3-su7. Hit-si5 in e5 hau7-tiuN2 chhoa7 goan2 khoaN3 tak8 kho e5 oh8-thiaN; khi3-khu7 ia7 chiau5-pi7, lau5-teng2 lau5-e7 khoaN3 beng5-pek8, chiu7 saN-si5. Koh kau3 chit8 keng oh8-tng5 si7 lan2 TiuN2-lo2-kau3 Chheng-lian5-hoe7 e5 oh8-tng5; hit-si5 i2-keng pang3-he7, sou2-i2 bo5 chim-chiok khoaN3. Goan2 chhiaN2 in chit8 lang5 chhoa7 goan2 kau3 le2-pai3-tng5 ; hit keng pai3-tng5 ia7 si7 toa7 keng u7 thah8-lau5; Bok8-su seN3 Tiong-chhoan mia5 Tek-thai3. I put-chi2 hoaN-hi2 eng7 kiong-keng3 e5 le2 chhiaN2 goan2, ia7 soa3 saN-kap gim5-si cho3 ki5-to2-hoe7 lai5 kam2-sia7 Siong7-te3. Ti7 chit Tiong5-kia7 u7 kui2-na7 keng e5 le2-pai3-tng5, ia7 u7 Thian-chu2-kau3 put-chi2 toa7 keng e5 pai3-tng5 .

到8號，我有kap台南廳e5通譯通口去肥前國佐賀縣e5武雄市。Ti7蓬萊山腳有一個溫泉，是天然e5礦泉，tu2好燒冷。這個泉水含滷炭莞e5藥質，會thang hou7人身軀較勇壯，也會thang醫人e5病。Ti7 這個溫泉有起真大間e5厝來蓋；內分4等e5浴池，也有分男女e5浴池；一、二、三等是hou7 chhin3-chhai2人thang去洗；一等--e5只有3 chiam錢。也另外ti7水頭起一座樓，擺設不止齊整，續ti7樓腳用不止sui2 e5榭石kap花磚造一個浴池；是hou7皇帝，以及王親大臣，有時thang去洗；若平常日官家紳士，抑是外國貴氣e5人客，也thang ti7 hia洗浴。這個溫泉通口君in兄也有份，所以不止好意請阮洗，也無收錢。洗了後上蓬萊山；這個有逐色e5山花，不止sui2，樹木茂盛親像天然e5花園；也有清涼，koh是王家歇涼e5所在；也有廣福寺。Ti7山頂有500身e5石像；有人講中國人起頭去日本就是這個蓬萊山。秦朝徐福ti7這個山求仙；中國冊有記。稱這個山叫做仙山。

Kau3 8 ho7, goa2 u7 kap Tai5-lam5-thiaN e5 thong-ek8 Thong-khau2 khi3 Hui5-chian5-kok Cho2-ho7-koan7 e5 Bu2-hiong5-chhi7. Ti7 Hong5-lai5 soaN-kha u7 chit8 e5 Un-choaN5, si7 thian-jian5 e5 khong3-choaN5, tu2-ho2 sio-leng2. Chit e5 choaN5-chui2 ham5 Lou2-than3-oan2 e5 ioh8-chit, e7 thang hou7 lang5 sin-khu khah iong2-chong3, ia7 e7 thang i lang5 e5 peN7. Ti7 chit e5 un-choaN5 u7 khi2 chin toa7 keng e5 chhu3 lai5 kham3; lai7 hun 4 teng2 e5 ek8-ti5, ia7 u7 hun lam5-lu2 e5 ek8-ti5; it, ji7, saN teng2 si7 hou7 chhin3-chhai2 lang5 thang khi3 se2; it-teng2--e5 chi2-u7 3 chiam-chiN5. Ia7 leng7-goa7 ti7 chui2-thau5 khi2 chit8 cho7 lau5, pai5-siat put-chi2 che5-cheng2, soa3 ti7 lau5-kha eng7 put-chi2 sui2 e5 sia7-chioh8 kap hoe-chng cho7 chit8 e5 ek8-ti5; si7 hou7 Hong5-te3, i2-kip8 Ong5-chhin tai7-sin5, u7-si5 thang khi3 se2; na7 peng5-siong5 jit8 koaN-ka sin-su7, a2 si7 goa7-kok kui3-khi3 e5 lang5-kheh, ia7 thang ti7 hia se2-ek8. Chit e5 un-choaN5 Thong-khau2-kun in hiaN ia7 u7 hun7, sou2-i2 put-chi2 ho2-i3 chhiaN2 goan2 se2, ia7 bo5 siu-chiN5. Se2 liau2-au7 chiuN7 Hong5-lai5-soaN; chit e5 u7 tak8-sek e5 soaN-hoe, put-chi2 sui2, chhiu7-bok8 bou7-seng7 chhin-chhiuN7 thian-jian5 e5 hoe-hng5; ia7 u7 chheng-liang5, koh si7 ong5-ka hioh liang5 e5 sou2-chai7; ia7 u7 Kong2-hok-si7. Ti7 soaN-teng2 u7 500 sin e5 chioh8-siong7; u7 lang5 kong2 Tiong-kok lang5 khi2-thau5 khi3 Jit8-pun2 chiu7-si7 chit e5 Hong5-lai5-soaN. Chin5-tiau5 Chhi5 Hok ti7 chit e5 soaN kiu5-sian; Tiong-kok chheh u7 ki3. Chheng chit e5 soaN kio3-cho3 Sian-soaN.
第9號就去門司【Moji】；這個街市是九州e5尾港kap長州豐前國馬關【Shimonoseki】相對面。
Te7 9 ho7 chiu7 khi3 Mng5-si7 [Moji]; chit e5 ke-chhi7 si7 Kiu2-chiu e5 boe2 kang2 kap Tiong5-chiu Hong-chian5-kok Ma2-koan [Shimonoseki] saN tui3-bin7.

第10號，坐小貨船過去馬關；ti7 hia有一個接引寺，就是頂年李鴻章去hia議和e5所在。E7晡再回船；11號到宇品港【Ujian】；這個港是明治28年駐紮戰船e5所在。皇帝toa3 hia 6月久；所以ti7 hia續建置街市。Tui3 chia坐火車起身；e5昏7點到大阪【Osaka】停車場。Ti7 chia真鬧熱；往來e5火車頭講有64隻，逐時有火車來往。再坐火車到天王寺落車；就有台灣協會大阪ko-pou7主任廣野一郎君chhoa7幾若個會員ti7 hia等接，chhoa7阮到台灣紳士接待所。Ti7 這個會館，攏是備辦teh hou7台灣人歇--e5，也攏是照台灣風俗款待台灣人。

Te7 10 ho7, che7 sio2 hoe3-chun5 koe3 khi3 Ma2-koan; ti7 hia u7 chit8 e5 Chiap-in2-si7, chiu7-si7 teng2-ni5 Li2 Hong5-chiong khi3 hia gi7-ho5 e5 sou2-chai7. E7-pou chai3 hoe5-chun5; 11 ho7 kau3 U2-phin2-kang2 [Ujian]; chit e5 kang2 si7 Beng5-ti7 28 ni5 chu7 chat chian3-chun5 e5 sou2-chai7. Hong5-te3 toa3 hia 6 goeh8 ku2; sou2-i2 ti7 hia soa3 kian3-ti3 ke-chhi7. Tui3 chia che7 hoe2-chhia khi2-sin; e5-hng 7 tiam2 kau3 Tai7-pan2 [Osaka] theng5 chhia-tiuN5. Ti7 chia chin lau7-jiat8; ong2-lai5 e5 hoe2-chhia-thau5 kong2 u7 64 chiah, tak8-si5 u7 hoe2-chhia lai5 ong2. Chai3 che7 hoe2-chhia kau3 Thian-ong5-si7 loh8-chhia; chiu7 u7 Tai5-oan5 hiap8-hoe7 Tai7-pan2 ko-pou7 Chu2-jim7 Kong2-ia2 It-long5-kun chhoa7 kui2-na7 e5 hoe7-oan5 ti7 hia tan2-chih, chhoa7 goan2 kau3 Tai5-oan5 Sin-su7 chiap-thai7-sou2. Ti7 chit e5 hoe7-koan2, long2 si7 pi7-pan7 teh hou7 Tai5-oan5 lang5 hioh--e5, ia7 long2 si7 chiau3 Tai5-oan5 hong-siok8 khoan2-thai7 Tai5-oan5 lang5.

12號入博覽會，先入台灣館；這館e5土產齊備，逐項e5風俗，攏畫圖，也有裝人e5像。也入去美術館內，排列字畫刺繡以及人工奇巧製造--e5，不止巧妙，親像生成--e5。Koh ti7會場有一個望遠樓，高168尺，用電氣機上落；上頂面thang看周圍數十里。也用電氣跑車走chha5-be2；也有噴水塔假落雨。博覽會場攏是點電燈數萬支，e5昏時親像日時，電火照著hit個噴水塔用目珠看，儼然落雨，koh有出虹，因為一爿有光，一爿有雨就自然有虹；所以落雨天會出虹就是這個理。

12 ho7 jip8 Phok-lam2-hoe7, seng jip8 Tai5-oan5 koan2; chit koan2 e5 thou2-san2 che5-pi7, tak8-hang7 e5 hong-siok8, long2 oe7-tou5, ia7 u7 chng lang5 e5 siong7. Ia7 jip8 khi3 Bi2-sut8-koan2 lai7, pai5-liat8 ji7-oe7 chhiah siu3 i2-kip8 lang5-kang ki5-khiau2 che3-cho7--e5, put-chi2 khiau2-biau7, chhin-chhiuN7 seN-seng5--e5. Koh ti7 hoe7-tiuN5 u7 chit8 e5 Bong7-oan2-lau5, koan5 168 chhioh, eng7 tian7-khi3-ki chiuN7 loh8; chiuN7 teng2-bin7 thang khoaN3 chiu-ui5 sou3-chap8 li2. Ia7 eng7 tian7-khi3 phau2 chhia chau2 chha5-be2; ia7 u7 phun3-chui2-thah ke2 loh8-hou7. Phok-lam2-hoe7 tiuN5 long2 si7 tiam2 tian7-teng sou3 ban7 ki, e5-hng-si5 chhin-chhiuN7 jit8-si5, tian7-hoe2 chio3 tioh8 hit e5 phun3-chui2-thah eng7 bak8-chiu khoaN3, giam2-jian5 loh8-hou7, koh u7 chhut kheng7, in-ui7 chit8 peng5 u7 kng, chit8-peng5 u7 hou7 chiu7 chu7-jian5 u7 kheng7; sou2-i2 loh8-hou7 thiN e7 chhut kheng7 chiu7-si7 chit e5 li2.
到暝昏就入美國設e5不思議館，看活動e5燈影，hit時儼然親像身軀到ti7外國，teh看著義民軍出戰一樣。看了入氣機屋內面有無線e5電氣；也有用電teh畫圖ti7柴e5器具裡；也有用電氣teh io兩個無夠月e5囡仔，囡仔ti7 這電箱內講比ti7老母e5腹肚較快大。也有光線電thang看見人身軀逐位e5區；不論甚物所在骨有受傷攏會thang看。

Kau3 me5-hng chiu7 jip8 Bi2-kok siat e5 Put-su-gi7-koan2, khoaN3 oah8-tang7 e5 teng-iaN2, hit-si5 giam2-jian5 chhin-chhiuN7 sin-khu kau3 ti7 goa7-kok, teh khoaN3 tioh8 gi7-bin5-kun chhut-chian3 chit8-iuN7. KhoaN3 liau2 jip8 Khi3-ki-ok lai7-bin7 u7 bo5 soaN3 e5 tian7-khi3; ia7 u7 eng7 tian7 teh oe7-tou5 ti7 chha5 e5 khi3-khu7--nih8; ia7 u7 eng7 tian7-khi3 teh io nng7 e5 bo5 kau3 goeh8 e5 gin2-na2, gin2-na2 ti7 chit tian7-siuN lai7 kong2 pi2 ti7 lau7-bo2 e5 pak-tou2 khah khoai3 toa7. Ia7 u7 kng-soaN3-tian7 thang khoaN3-kiN3 lang5 sin-khu tak8-ui7 e5 khu; put-lun7 sim2-mih8 sou2-chai7 kut u7 siu7-siong long2 e7 thang khoaN3.
第13號有落雨，所以我kap一個朋友坐火車去神戶【Kobe】探朋友。秋山善一先生kap伊e5家後，也攏ti7 hia。Ti7 14 e7晡koh倒轉來大阪。

Te7 13 ho7 u7 loh8-hou7, sou2-i2 goa2 kap chit8 e5 peng5-iu2 che7 hoe2-chhia khi3 Sin5-hou7 [Kobe] tham3 peng5-iu2. Chhiu-san Sian7-it sian-siN kap i e5 ke-au7, ia7 long2 ti7 hia. Ti7 14 e7-pou koh to3-tng2 lai5 Tai7-pan2.

第15號去Kai3市看水族館，水中所有e5魚鱉有鱗無鱗e5攏有。Koh入博覽會機器館，內面逐等號製造--e5機器真濟。也有製紙e5，也有製電氣車e5，也有製茶e5，製麵線e5，織布e5，製印字e5，製雪文e5，無牛家己會挨磨e5，造火柴e5；真濟款，看be7盡，記be7了。Koh有灌溉e5水龍，thang汲水30丈深，一點鐘久出水千外石；價錢2，250箍。我看這等號e5器具不止有合台灣e5路用，因為有真濟e5看天田，人若合股買，就有真大e5利益。這水龍ti7大阪有thang買。Koh看林業館、水產館、農業館、教育館；逐項e5物件，土產、水產無m7齊備。

Te7 15 ho7 khi3 Kai3-chhi7 khoaN3 Chui2-chok8-koan2, chui2-tiong sou2 u7 e5 hi5-pih u7 lan5 bo5 lan5 e5 long2 u7. Koh jip8 Phok-lam2-hoe7 Ki-khi3-koan2, lai7-bin7 tak8 teng2 ho7 che3 cho7 e5 ki-khi3 chin che7. Ia7 u7 che3 choa2--e5, ia7 u7 che3 tian7-khi3-chhia--e5, ia7 u7 che3 te5--e5, che3 mi7-soaN3--e5, chit pou3 e5, che3 in3-ji7--e5, che3 soat-bun5--e5, bo5 gu5 ka-ti7 e7 e-bou7--e5, cho7 hoe2-chha5--e5; chin che7 khoan2, khoaN3 be7 chin7, ki3 be7 liau2. Koh u7 koan3-khai3 e5 chui2-leng5, thang khip-chui2 30 tng7 chhim, chit8 tiam2-cheng ku2 chhut-chui2 chheng goa7 chioh8; ke3-chiN5 2,250 khou. Goa2 khoaN3 chit teng2-ho7 e5 khi3-khu7 put-chi2 u7 hap8 Tai5-oan5 e5 lou7-eng7, in-ui7 u7 chin che7 e5 khoaN3-thiN chhan5, lang5 na7 hap8-kou2 be2, chiu7 u7 chin toa7 e5 li7-ek. Che chui2-leng5 ti7 Tai7-pan2 u7 thang be2. Koh khoaN3 Lim5-giap8-koan2, Chui2-san2-koan2, Long5-giap8-koan2, Kau3-iok8-koan2; tak8-hang7 e5 mih8-kiaN7, thou2-san2, chui2-san2 bo5 m7 chiau5-pi7.

第16號入動物園，內面山禽野獸，鱷魚、虎、豹、獅、象、駱駝、狐狸、狗熊、人熊、猩猩、白鶴，孔雀、雉雞鳥，逐項講be7盡。Koh入通運館，參古館，ti7 這館有排列各國e5名物寶器，有e5價值連城。也有中國古早e5寶器，也有漢朝e5瓦、王莽e5鼎，陀螺形，寶玉e5如意，逐國攏有提物去賽會。敢是因為這pang日本第5回e5 博覽會，tu2好前年有入萬國公會，也是扑贏中國；所以逐國e5人正有chiah熱心來博覽。

Te7 16 ho7 jip8 Tong7-but8-hng5, lai7-bin7 soaN-khim5 ia2-siu3, gok8-hi5, hou2, pa3, sai, chhiuN7, lok8-to5, hou5-li5, kau2-him5, lang5-him5, seng-seng, peh8-hoh8, khong2-chhiok, ti3-koe-chiau2, tak8-hang7 kong2 be7 chin7. Koh jip8 Thong-un7-koan2, Chham-kou2-koan2, ti7 chit koan2 u7 pai5-liat8 kok-kok e5 beng5-but8 po2-khi3, u7-e5 ke3 tat8 lian5-siaN5. Ia7 u7 Tiong-kok kou2-cha2 e5 po2-khi3, ia7 u7 Han3-tiau5 e5 hia7, Ong5-bong2 e5 tiaN2, To5-lo5-heng5, po2-gek8 e5 ju5-i3, tak8-kok long2 u7 theh8 mih8 khi3 sai3-hoe7. KaN2 si7 in-ui7 chit-pang Jit8-pun2 te7 5 hoe5 e5 Phok-lam2-hoe7, tu2-ho2 cheng5 ni5 u7 jip8 Ban7-kok kong-hoe7, ia7 si7 phah iaN5 Tiong-kok; sou2-i2 tak8-kok e5 lang5 chiaN3 u7 chiah jiat8-sim lai5 phok-lam2.

第18號有hou7總務課長chhoa7阮去看金宮 e5火柴劇；婦人囡仔幾若百個，有e5包，有e5封，扛手活動，機器也真巧妙。看了就去大阪e5造銀局，這個局真大，有分幾若間；有e5 teh熔銀，有e5鑄銀板，有e5鑄銀角仔，有e5鑄金鈸仔，有e5鑄銅koa，有e5 teh鑑定分量，逐項e5機器不止巧妙。看了就到一間商業改良e5會議所不止大間，內面椅桌排列真整齊，thang容允1500人。

Te7 18 ho7 u7 hou7 chong2-bu7-kho3-tiuN2 chhoa7 goan2 khi3 khoaN3 Kim-kiong e5 hoe2-chha5-kek8; hu7-jin5 gin2-na2 kui2-na7 pah e5, u7-e5 pau, u7-e5 hong, kng-chhiu2 oah8-tang7, ki-khi3 ia7 chin khiau2-biau7. Au7-lai5 koh kau3 Chhoan-pak-chhoan A-po7 che3-choa2 e5 Hap8-chu hoe7-sia7; lai7-Bin7 u7 3 e5 toa7 ki-khi3, si7 Eng-kok kap Tek-kok chhut--e5. Leng7-goa7 u7 goan5-tong7-ki, chit e5 ki-khi3 tng2 phio3-liau7 ki-khi3, hap8-chiaN5 ki cho7 choa2 ki, poe7-ta ki, tak8-e5 toe3 i tin2-tang7, choa2 ka-ti7 ta, ka-ti7 chian2-che5, ka-ti7 thiap8 chin ho2-se3. Chit8 jit8 chit8 e5 ki-khi3 e7 thang cho7 4 ban7 khun2 e5 choa2. Goan5-liau7 si7 chiong phoa3-pou3, tiu7-chhau2, moa5-ko2, bak8-liau7 chham ioh8 loh8 khi3 au e5.

Koh到金根紡織合資會社，製棉e5紡織廠，真大間，也疊樓；較濟是用玻璃kham3，所以不止光。查某囡仔2千外人teh巡機器。代先用棉花過一個器具，就變棉板；koh過織，就成棉條；koh過一個，成棉紗；也有分做幾十號e5紗，有大有細。將紗牽落kui，就歸家己會織布；一日一個kui會織得3丈外，一人會thang掌3個kui，不過是巡看，若有紗斷就拾起來接na7-tiaN7，無用人e5手掌kui也免用腳踏，真正巧妙。親像孟子講，工欲善其事，必先利其器，聖哉是言耶。

Koh kau3 Kim-kin phang2-chit hap8-chu-hoe7-sia7, che3-mi5 e5 phang2-chit-chhiuN2, chin toa7 keng, ia7 thah8-lau5; khah che7 si7 eng7 po-le5 kham3, sou2-i2 put-chi2 kng. Cha-bou2 gin2-na2 2 chheng goa7 lang5 teh sun5 ki-khi3. Tai7-seng eng7 mi5-hoe koe3 chit8 e5 khi3-khu7, chiu7 piN3 mi5 pan2; koh koe3 chit, chiu7 chiaN5 mi5-tiau5; koh koe3 chit8 e5, chiaN5 mi5-se; ia7 u7 hun cho3 kui2 chap8 ho7 e5 se, u7 toa7 u7 se3. Chhin-chhiuN7 Beng7-chu2 kong2, Kong iok8 sian7 ki5 su7, pit sian li7 ki5-khi3, Seng3-chai si7 gian5-ia5.
第19號下晡3點鐘坐火車；5點半到京都【Kyoto】。
Te7 19 ho7 e7-pou 3 tiam2-cheng che7 hoe2-chhia; 5 tiam2 poaN3 kau3 KiaN-tou [Kyoto].

Te7 20 ho7 goan2 saN-kap che7 chhia kau3 Chu-ho7-koan7, Kin7-kang moa2-si7 phang2-chit chu-sek hoe7-sia7. Khah che7 si7 chiong hit kui2-na7 ho7 e5 soaN3 pak8 kui-khun2, chai3 khi3 Tiong-kok be7. Au7-lai5 koh kau3 Chioh8-san-si7, khoaN3 Pi-pe5-ou5 chiu-ui5 e5 pat-keng2, ti7 chit gam5-teng2 u7 Giok8-cho7 e5 sou2 chai7. Cheng5-ni5 Ngou5-kok Thai3-chu2 chiu7-si7 kau3 hia khoaN3 kong-keng2, beh to3-tng2 e5 si5 hou7 Jit8-pun2 lang5 eng7 chheng3 phah tioh8 thau5-khak e5 sou2-chai7.

Ti7代鎮hia自明治18年起工，tui3山腳鑿一條河，穿過2個山，到27年才好。Hit個山空e5河，船會thang來往；人kap貨tui3 hia過不止近，這個河有真大路用，tui3琵琶湖拾水到京都灌沃土地。也續ti7水孔設一間京都水利局；擺設二十外個原動機，京都攏是倚靠這港河水e5力來運動機器，m7免倚靠土炭抑是石油。所以京都e5自來水，自來火，逐等號e5機器廠攏tui3 這個局e5原動機發力運動。阮hit e7晡3點鐘就坐船tui3 hit個山孔河經過；ti7河內逐隻船攏有點燈；來往e5船不止濟，到5點半就出這個河口，ti7河口也有設水底e5 kiam7氣鐵路，將車載船到街路下貨；就koh載到河裡，船就浮ti7水裡便便thang koh駛tui3河裡過；真奇巧，koh好看。

Ti7 Tai7-tin3 hia chu7 Beng5-ti7 18 ni5 khi2-kang, tui3 soaN-kha chhak8 chit8 tiau5 ho5, chhoan3 koe3 2 e5 soaN, kau3 27 ni5 chiah ho2. Hit e5 soaN-khang e5 ho5, chun5 e7 thang lai5-ong2; lang5 kap hoe3 tui3 hia koe3 put-chi2 kin7, chit e5 ho5 u7 chin toa7 lou7-eng7, tui3 Pi-pe5-ou5 khioh chui2 kau3 KiaN-tou koan3-ak thou2-te7. Ia7 soa3 ti7 chui2-khang siat chit8 keng KiaN-tou chui2-li7-kiok8; pai5-siat ji7-chap8 goa7 e5 goan5-tong7-ki, KiaN-tou long2 si7 oa2-kho3 chit kang2 ho5-chui2 e5 lat8 lai5 un7-tong7 ki-khi3, m7 bian2 oa2-kho3 thou5-thoaN3 a2 si7 chioh8-iu5. Sou2-i2 KiaN-tou e5 chu7-lai5-chui2, chu7-lai5-hoe2, tak8-teng2-ho7 e5 ki-khi3-chhiuN2 long2 tui3 chit e5 kiok8 e5 goan5-tong7-ki hoat-lat8 un7-tong7. Goan2 hit e7-pou 3 tiam2-cheng chiu7 che7-chun5 tui3 hit e5 soaN-khang-ho5 keng-koe3; ti7 ho5 lai7 tak8 chiah chun5 long2 u7 tiam2-teng; lai5 ong2 e5 chun5 put-chi2 che7, kau3 5 tiam2 poaN3 chiu7 chhut chit e5 ho5 khau2, ti7 ho5 khau2 ia7 u7 siat chui2-te2 e5 kiam7-khi3 thih-lou7, chiong chhia chai3 chun5 kau3 ke-lou7 he7-hoe3; chiu7 koh-chai3 kau3 ho5--nih8, chun5 chiu7 phu5 ti7 chui2--nih8 pian7-pian7 thang koh sai2 tui3 ho5--nih8 koe3; chin ki5-khiau2, koh ho2 khoaN3.

21號，去本願寺，以及33間堂kap知恩院；ti7內面有皇帝歇e5所在；古跡字畫寶器，也be7少，順續去看丘武亭以及武德殿；續到舊禁城看經殿。Koh入京都e5盲啞學校；這間學堂是日本第一早咱教會e5牧師設e5。啞口臭耳人會用手做話，用指頭仔做五十音；三四年e5學生攏普略會講會讀，也會chhia2-oe7、作樂、做工夫，種種e5技藝，無輸平常人。青瞑--e5也學liah8-leng5、歷史、筆算、地理學、seng-li2學，以及身體學、音樂，濟濟項e5工藝tui3 an2-ni出學了大家也無輸平常人。

21 ho7, khi3 Pun2-goan7-si7, i2-kip8 33 keng-tng5 kap Ti-in-iN7; ti7 lai7-bin7 u7 Hong5-te3 hioh e5 sou2-chai7; kou2-chek ji7-oe7 po2-khi3, ia7 be7 chio2, sun7 soa3 khi3 khoaN3 Khu-bu2-teng5 i2-kip8 Bu2-tek-tian7; soa3 kau3 ku7 kim3 siaN5 khoaN3 keng tian7.Koh jip8 KiaN-tou e5 Bong5 a2 hak8-hau7; chit keng oh8-tng5 si7 Jit8-pun2 te7-it cha2 lan2 kau3-hoe7 e5 Bok8-su siat--e5. E2-kau2 chhau3-hi7 lang5 e7 eng7 chhiu2 cho3 oe7, eng7 chi2-thau5-a2 cho3 gou7-chap8-im; saN-si3 ni5 e5 hak8-seng long2 phou2-liok8 e7 kong2 e7 thak8, ia7 e7 chhia2-oe7, chok-gak8, cho3 kang-hu, chiong2-chiong2 e5 ki-ge7, bo5-su peng5-siong5 lang5. ChheN-me5--e5 ia7 oh8 liah8-leng5, lek8-su2, pit-soan3, te7-li2-hak8, seng-li2-hak8, i2-kip8 sin the2-hak8, im-gak8, che7-che7 hang7 e5 kang-ge7 tui3 an2-ni chhut-oh8 liau2 tai7-ke ia7 bo5-su peng5-siong5-lang5.

22號頂晡8點半鐘坐急行e5火車，到e5昏9點鐘就到東京。落車就有台灣協贊會員，也有一個長老姓尾崎名宗良；伊是台灣協會e5委員。伊真好禮逐日來chhoa7阮四界行，四界看光景。阮一禮拜久tiam3 ti7東京，禮拜e7晡4點半，順續kap德福去明治女學校，探黃英kap吳笑；in兩個4年久ti7 hia讀冊，卻有不止大有益，in所讀e5第一濟點e5是英文，第二和漢文、算數、學女工、seng-li2學、家政、地理、歷史、物理學、化學、畫圖、寫字、體操、詩歌、教法、禮式，照次序逐禮拜攏著讀chiah-e5課程。我見著in大家真歡喜；總是可惜in兩個台灣e5話soa3 be7記得，無半句會曉聽也be7曉講，真奇怪，敢是因為in兩個罕得講本地話e5因端，所以an2-ni。到6點相辭就倒轉來，到e5昏時7點半我kap德福去新榮橋e5教會赴in e5宣道會；有一個美國e5牧師伊是teh做明治學院e5教師，名S. P. Tuetan；koh有先生名大野直州，伊也是明治學院e5教師；in請阮坐，續將in另外teh做宣道會所beh吟e5幾若首詩hou7阮看in e5法，也是另外巧妙，代先大野先生唱，台頂就連連吟3首詩，才讀新約路加18：18～30。讀了就請一個先生ti7台頂祈禱；續koh吟一首詩，就請牧師章所讀e5聖經開拆講道理。講明白就祈禱退位，就koh一個將伊所講e5再koh叮嚀勉勵。煞尾koh吟一首詩，牧師祝福才散。In攏是坐ti7台頂，an2-ni hou7人e5心較be7記得厭；逐人較注神聽。我扑算這個是好用。

22 ho7 teng2-pou 8 tiam2 poaN3-cheng che7 kip-heng5 e5 hoe2-chhia, kau3 e5-hng 9 tiam2 cheng chiu7 kau3 Tang-kiaN. Loh8 chhia chiu7 u7 Tai5-oan5 hiap8-chan3 hoe7-oan5, ia7 u7 chit8 e5 TiuN2-lo2 seN3 Boe2-kia7 mia5 Chong-liong5; I si7 Tai5-oan5 hiap8-hoe7 e5 ui2-oan5. Goa2 kiN3 tioh8 in tai7-ke chin hoaN-hi2; chong2-si7 kho2-sioh in nng7 e5 Tai5-oan5 e5 oe7 soa3 be7 ki3-tit, bo5 poaN3-ku3 e7 hiau2 thiaN ia7 be7 hiau2 kong2, chin ki5-koai3, kaN2 si7 in-ui7 in nng7 e5 han2-tit kong2 pun2-te7 oe7 e5 in-toaN, sou2-i2 an2-ni. Kau3 6 tiam2 saN-si5 chiu7 to3-tng2 lai5, kau3 e5-hng-si5 7 tiam2 poaN3 goa2 kap Tek-hok khi3 Sin-eng5-kio5 e5 kau3-hoe7 hu3 in e5 soan-to7-hoe7; u7 chit8 e5 Bi2-kok e5 Bok8-su i si7 teh cho3 Beng5-ti7 hak8-iN7 e5 kau3-su, mia5 S. P. Tuetan; koh u7 Sian-seN mia5 Tai7-ia2 Tit8-chiu, i ia7 si7 Beng5-ti7 hak8-iN7 e5 kau3-su; in chhiaN2 goan2 che7, soa3 chiong in leng7-goa7 teh cho3 Soan-to7-hoe7 sou2 beh gim5 e5 kui2-na7 siu2 si hou7 goan2 khoaN3 in e5 hoat, ia7 si7 leng7-goa7 khiau2-biau7, tai7-seng Tai7-ia2 Sian-seN chhiuN3, tai5-teng2 chiu7 lian5-lian5 gim5 3 siu2 si, chiah thak8 Sin-iok Lou7-ka 18:18-30. Thak8 liau2 chiu7 chhiaN2 chit8 e5 Sian-seN ti7 tai5-teng2 ki5-to2; soa3 koh gim5 chit8 siu2 si, chiu7 chhiaN2 Bok8-su chiong sou2 thak8 e5 Seng3-keng khui-thiah kong2 to7-li2. 照an2-ni現時來看，是第1個較有錢，第3個較散hiong。伊e5老父平平有ka7 in建置家後；煞命令in逐年著將in所趁 e5錢十份抽一份，來獻做教會e5路用，咱扑算佗一個較會堪tit 趁命令mah？教會tui3 佗一個較有thang得著利益mah？也是佗一個較會栽培子弟來做教會e5路用mah？若koh過十年抑是二十年，大家扑算佗一人thang chhun mah？Kiam2 m7是第3個mah？因為伊所趁 e5無限量，koh夠額有thang chhun；第2個不過是會tit過na7-tiaN7，第3個kiam2-chhai2所入不供所出。俗語講，緊紡無好紗，緊截無好地，欲速則不達，見小利就大事be7成，真正是一號話。

Chiau3 an2-ni hian7-si5 lai5 khoaN3, si7 te7 1 e5 khah u7 chiN5, te7 3 e5 khah song3-hiong. I e5 lau7-pe7 peN5-peN5 u7 ka7 in kian3-ti3 ke-au7; soa3 beng7-leng7 in tak8-ni5 tioh8 chiong in sou2 than3 e5 chiN5 chap8 hun7 thiu chit8 hun7, lai5 hian3 cho3 kau3-hoe7 e5 lou7-eng7, lan2 phah-sng3 to2 chit8 e5 khah e7 kham-tit than3 beng7-leng7 mah? Na7 koh koe3 chap8 ni5 a2 si7 ji7-chap8 ni5, tai7-ke phah-sng3 to2 chit8 lang5 thang chhun mah? Kiam2 m7 si7 te7 3 e5 mah? In-ui7 i sou2 than3 e5 bo5 han7-liong7, koh kau3-giah8 u7 thang chhun; te7 2 e5 put-ko3 si7 e7 tit koe3 na7-tiaN7, te7 3 e5 kiam2-chhai2 sou2 jip8 put-kiong sou2 chhut. Siok8-gu2 kong2, Kin2 phang2 bo5 ho2 se, kin2 cheh bo5 ho2-te7, iok8-sok chek put-tat8, kian3-siau2-li7 chiu7 toa7 su7 be7 chiaN5, chin-chiaN3 si7 chit8 ho7 oe7.
做序大e5人，的確m7 thang看ti7目珠前，ai3使緊錢，反轉有損害；煞致到子孫be7出頭。三字經有記載講，養飼若無教示，做父e5人有過失；koh有講，黃金滿籃m7達著教子一項e5技藝。請咱大家著致意設法hou7子兒得著學問，是較好咱濟濟家業。

Cho3 si7-toa7 e5 lang5, tek-khak m7 thang khoaN3 ti7 bak8-chiu cheng5, ai3 sai2 kin2-chiN5, hoan2-tng2 u7 sun2-hai7; soa3 ti3-kau3 kiaN2-sun be7 chhut-thau5. Sam-ju7-keng u7 ki3-chai3 kong2, IuN2-chhi7 na7 bo5 ka3-si7, cho3 pe7 e5 lang5 u7 koe3-sit; koh u7 kong2, Ng5-kim moa2-na5 m7 tat8 tioh8 ka3 kiaN2 chit8 hang7 e5 ki-ge7. ChhiaN2 lan2 tai7-ke tioh8 ti3-i3 siat-hoat hou7 kiaN2-ji5 tit tioh8 hak8-bun7, si7 khah ho2 lan2 che7-che7 ke-giap8.

這是只有講大概na7-tiaN7，望大家致意想，日本三十年前kap咱無各樣；三十年後來已經kap歐洲諸國並稱文明；所著用e5機器較濟家己造；親像造船廠，造砲局就是造大槍kap小槍，以及跟蹤造電氣機以及各等e5原動機，造水龍，水管；商業中所著用e5器械較濟是本國家己做e5。我有看會社濟濟款不止大間，也有不止巧妙e5，也有親像造銀票e5局，是用電機器teh刻印版，刻到不止sui2，hou7人oh tit假做。

Che si7 chi2-u7 kong2 tai7-khai3 na7-tiaN7, bang7 tai7-ke ti3-i3 siuN7, Jit8-pun2 saN-chap8 ni5-cheng5 kap lan2 bo5 kok-iuN7; saN-chap8 ni5-au7 lai5 i2-keng kap Au-chiu chu-kok peng7-chheng bun5-beng5; sou2 tioh8 eng7 e5 ki-khi3 khah choe7 ka-ki7 cho7; chhin-chhiuN7 cho7-chun5-chhiuN2, cho7-phau3-kiok8 chiu7-si7 cho7 toa7-chheng3 kap sio2-chheng3, i2-kip8 kin-chong cho7 tian7-khi3-ki i2-kip8 kok-teng2 e5 goan5-tong7-ki, cho7 chui2-leng5, chui2-kong2; siong-giap8 tiong sou2 tioh8 eng7 e5 khi3-hai5 khah choe7 si7 pun2-kok ka-ki7 cho3 e5. 後來我koh到大稻埕e5禮拜堂。這間拜堂是李壬水先生teh傳道，拜堂e5周圍栽濟濟花，雕琢不止好看。也tu2好tu2著秦天恩伊toa3 ti7拜堂邊，所以我請伊chhoa7阮去探李春生長老。伊今年63歲，iau2-ku2不止勇，也不止活動teh辦教會e5事。有著一部冊，名叫民教冤獄解。內中是論起世俗人趁別物到致到心目無光明，受迷be7曉服事真e5上帝，反轉常常kap教會做對敵，來窘逐聖會e5事。也有問答、辯論、解明，逐項e5差謬，人若看hit號冊，穩當kap教會較和好，所以伊本身有印一千本teh送人。若ai3看e5人寫批 tui3伊討，伊歡喜送。伊有寄我十外本beh送讀冊人。阮到13號koh tui3基隆坐船，到14號早起到安平，官府有派小貨船載阮上山。也有區長參事官員ti7 hia等接；大家平安相見，真感謝。主e5恩典，逐時逐所在有照顧伊e5百姓。

Au7-lai5 goa2 koh kau3 Toa7-tiu7-tiaN5 e5 le2-pai3-tng5. Chit keng pai3-tng5 si7 Li2 Jim7-sui2 Sian-seN teh thoan5-to7, pai3-tng5 e5 chiu ui5 chai che7-che7 hoe, tiau-tok put-chi2 ho2-khoaN3.
